mapper.select: SELECT c.executeplanname,b.casename,a.batchname,a.runtime,a.samples,a.errorcount,a.errorrate,a.average,a.min,a.max,a.median,a.nzpct,a.nfpct,a.nnpct,a.tps,a.receivekbsec,a.sendkbsec,a.create_time FROM apicases_performancestatistics a join apicases b join executeplan c on a.caseid=b.id and a.testplanid=c.id order by a.create_time DESC

SELECT b.executeplanname as executeplanname ,a.* FROM apicases_performancestatistics a inner join executeplan b on a.testplanid =b.id where a.testplanid=#{testplanid} and a.batchname =#{batchname} and a.projectid =#{projectid}
